body: So i was playing on this one map and then everybody froze. The other players where frozen but chat was still working. In chat every body was complaining about everybody  else being frozen. And then all of a sudden every body crashed and the number of players on the server went from like 300 to 40. So yea lol!
body_tagged: So i was playing on this one map and then everybody froze. The other players where frozen but chat was still working. In chat every body was complaining about everybody  else being frozen. And then all of a sudden every body crashed and the number of players on the server went from like 300 to 40. So yea lol!
title: The Crash! Every Body Crashed!! XD LOL

replies.body: The Server is undergoing some unexpected maintenance, it should be fixed soon.
